title: Through the Drama
overview: In each episode, Harrison and Zima, married October 2023, take viewers through the drama of the day's most captivating stories, offering unfiltered takes on trending entertainment and lifestyle topics â€” from the celebrity chaos on the coasts to the issues that matter most in middle America. With their signature blend of humor and heart, they deliver a fresh, positive spin on the day's headlines, bringing audiences the drama, minus the stress.
